DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy new serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SNRI ) nin functional recovery ischemic stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Effect F2695 Functional Recovery After Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: Male female patient , 18 80 year age Confirmed acute ischemic stroke within past 2 10 day Unilateral motor deficit , National Institutes Health stroke scale ( NIHSS ) motor score > = 5 Modified Rankin Scale ( mRS ) 4 5 Able willing comply site rehabilitation program requirement Aphasia Severe poststroke condition Active depressive episode Intracerebral hemorrhage Use antidepressant drug Cardiac rhythm disorder Uncontrolled arterial hypertension Other severe acute chronic medical psychiatric condition .
